entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
